===========
apeye-core
===========

.. start short_desc

**Core (offline) functionality for the apeye library.**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``apeye-core`` can be installed from PyPI or Anaconda.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install apeye-core

To install with ``conda``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ conda install -c conda-forge apeye-core

.. end installation
